code: import React,{useState}from'react';import ClientsService from'./ClientService';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function ClientAdder(){const[client,setClient]=useState({name:'',address:'',email:'',phoneNumber:''});const handleChange=e=>{const{name,value}=e.target;setClient(prev=>({...prev,[name]:value}));};const handleSubmit=e=>{e.preventDefault();ClientsService.create(client).then(()=>alert('Client added successfully')).catch(error=>console.error(error));};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{onSubmit:handleSubmit,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{name:"name",placeholder:"Name",maxLength:"15",required:true,onChange:handleChange}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{name:"address",placeholder:"Address",required:true,onChange:handleChange}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{name:"email",type:"email",placeholder:"Email",maxLength:"50",required:true,onChange:handleChange}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{name:"phoneNumber",type:"number",placeholder:"Phone Number",required:true,onChange:handleChange}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"submit",children:"Add Client"})]});}export default ClientAdder;
